data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Minnesota at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 3, Minnesota's Raheem Edwards breaks free at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Houston.
Niko Hansen (Houston) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 6, In Houston Houston drive forward through Memo Rodriguez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Houston to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
In the minute 10, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Minnesota's Mason Toye is on target but unsuccessful.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 11, Chase Gasper of Minnesota gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Throw-in Houston.
In the minute 14, Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Houston in the half of Minnesota.
Houston are coming forward and Darwin Quintero gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Minnesota's Raheem Edwards gets in a shot on goal at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Minnesota, close to Houston's area.
Houston have a goal kick.
Houston push forward at BBVA Compass Stadium and Memo Rodriguez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Minnesota defence.
In the minute 25, Can Houston capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
In Houston Houston attack through Darwin Quintero. The finish is off target, however.
Allen Chapman awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Christian Ramirez for Houston drives towards goal at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Houston take a 1-0 lead thanks to Darwin Quintero.
In the minute 28, Memo Rodriguez instrumental with a fine assist.
Niko Hansen gets his shot on target but fails to score for Houston.
Throw-in for Minnesota close to the penalty box.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Attention is being given to Houstonâ€™s Memo Rodriguez and play has been suspended briefly.
Memo Rodriguez is back on his feet again.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minnesota's Raheem Edwards gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Matias Vera (Houston) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 41, Houston pushes forward through Darwin Ceren, whose finish on goal is saved.
Niko Hansen for Houston gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Allen Chapman awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Minnesota drives forward and Mason Toye gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Darwin Quintero for Houston drives towards goal at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Houston are whistled for offside.
In the minute 48, In Houston Houston drive forward through Christian Ramirez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the away team in Houston.
Chase Gasper gets his shot on target but fails to score for Minnesota.
Houston needs to be cautious. Minnesota have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 53, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Houston.
Houston's Darwin Quintero gets in a shot on goal at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Allen Chapman signals a Houston throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Ariel Lassiter is replacing Christian Ramirez for the home team.
Houston make their second substitution with Alberth Elis replacing Niko Hansen.
In the minute 56, Hassani Dotson (Minnesota) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Houston in Houston.
The match at BBVA Compass Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mason Toye, who is down injured.
In the minute 59, The away team has substituted Mason Toye with Luis Amarilla. Adrian Heath is thus making his first change.
In the minute 60, Houston have a dangerous throw-in.
Adrian Heath (Minnesota) is making a third substitution, with Ethan Finlay replacing Robin Lod.
Adrian Heath is making the team's second substitution at BBVA Compass Stadium with Kevin Molino replacing Raheem Edwards.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Minnesota close to the penalty box.
Minnesota are pushing forward but Hassani Dotson's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
In the minute 65, Goal! Houston extend their lead to 2-0 through Ariel Lassiter.
Alberth Elis with an assist there.
Minnesota have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 67, Houston have a goal kick.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Houston.
In the minute 70, Ariel Lassiter puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Great play from Alberth Elis to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Houston.
In the minute 71, The away team replace Jan Gregus with Emanuel Reynoso.
The away team have replaced Marlon Hairston with Jacori Hayes. This is the fifth substitution made today by Adrian Heath.
Alberth Elis gets his shot on target but fails to score for Houston.
In the minute 74, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Boniek Garcia is on a sub for Darwin Quintero for Houston.
Allen Chapman awards Houston a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in high up the field for Houston in Houston.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Minnesota.
In the minute 79, Minnesota's Kevin Molino misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Kiki Struna (Houston) has received a first yellow card.
Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Minnesota, close to Houston's area.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Wilfried Zahibo is replacing Matias Vera for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Nico Lemoine is replacing Memo Rodriguez for the home team.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
In Houston a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Houston.
In the minute 84, Michael Boxall (Minnesota) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Houston.
In the minute 87, Important block from the Houston defence as Kevin Molino fires in a strike for Minnesota.
Houston's Boniek Garcia breaks free at BBVA Compass Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Allen Chapman awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Allen Chapman will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Minnesota are coming forward and Hassani Dotson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Houston at BBVA Compass Stadium.
Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Houston.
Corner awarded to Houston.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
Houston's Wilfried Zahibo has been booked in Houston.
